Package mulan.evaluation.measure

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MacroAverageMeasure
    Interface for macro average measures
    Measure
    Interface for a measure, used to evaluate the performance of a multi-label learner on when performing multi-label learning task.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AverageMAE
    Implementation of average Mean Absolute Error (MAE) measure.
    AveragePrecision
    Implementation of the average precision measure.
    AverageRelativeMAE
    Implementation of the average Relative Mean Absolute Error (RMAE) measure.
    AverageRelativeRMSE
    Implementation of the average Relative Root Mean Squared Error (RRMSE) measure.
    AverageRMSE
    Implementation of the average Root Mean Squared Error (RMSE) measure.
